snippet: Mohamedou Ould Slahi, arrested in Mauritania and held at the prison in Cuba for 14 years, wrote an account of his detention that his family hopes will help a campaign to win his release.
abstract: Guantanamo Bay detainee Mohamedou Ould Slahi, held at prison for 14 years, publishes book Guantanamo Diary about his experiences there; was arrested in Mauritania in 2001 but was never charged with terrorism; his family is using book to start campaign for his release.
lead_paragraph: Mohamedou Ould Slahi, arrested in Mauritania and held at the prison in Cuba for 14 years, wrote an account of his detention that his family hopes will help a campaign to win his release.

headline.main: Family Seeks Release of a Guantánamo Detainee Turned Author
headline.print_headline: Family Seeks Release of a Detainee Turned Author

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
